sense.gloss: being attached (to), being affiliated (to), belonging (to), going with

sdata.j: その↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓には↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓の|↑付属|↑↓ふぞく↓↑病院↑↓びょういん↓が↑３↑↓みっ↓つある。
sdata.e: The company has three hospitals of its own.
